text:
The comedian got the surprise of her life Thursday during an appearance on “The Ellen DeGeneres Show” featuring a very special guest.

Oprah Winfrey, hero to Haddish and, well, much of the world, had appeared as DeGeneres’ guest earlier in the program, but Haddish was told the star of “A Wrinkle in Time” left immediately after her sit-down.
title: HFPA investigating Brendan Fraser's sexual assault claim; James Woods steps up as an ally

meta_data.description: The HFPA is investigating Brendan Fraser's allegation that a former president of the group that puts on the Golden Globes sexually assaulted him and then blackballed him. James Woods says he too was shunned by the group after offending the same person, who denies the allegations.
